mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dividends ( rs_id, user_id, dividend_type, amount_bf_tax, tax, amount_aft_tax, poll_end_date ) VALUES ( #{rsId}, #{userId}, #{dividendType}, #{amountBfTax}, #{tax}, #{amountAftTax}, #{pollEndDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT d.*, u.user_name as userName, u.email as userEmail FROM dividends d JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.user_id WHERE d.status = 'PENDING' AND d.poll_end_date > NOW()
mapper.update: UPDATE dividends SET status = 'POLLING' WHERE dividend_id = #{dividendId}
UPDATE dividends SET status = 'DECIDED', dividend_type = #{dividendType}, paid_amount = amount_aft_tax, selection_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE dividend_id = #{dividendId} AND status = 'POLLING'
